metadata.title: CMMC Model V2 Level 3 Security Controls

props.name: description
props.value: Limit information system access to authorized users, processes acting on behalf of authorized users, or devices (including other information systems).

props.name: description
props.value: Limit information system access to the types of transactions and functions that authorized users are permitted to execute.

props.name: description
props.value: Verify and control/limit connections to and use of external information systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Control information posted or processed on publicly accessible information systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Control the flow of CUI in accordance with approved authorizations.

props.name: description
props.value: Separate the duties of individuals to reduce the risk of malevolent activity without collusion.

props.name: description
props.value: Employ the principle of least privilege, including for specific security functions and privileged accounts.

props.name: description
props.value: Use non-privileged accounts or roles when accessing nonsecurity functions.

props.name: description
props.value: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions and capture the execution of such functions in audit logs.

props.name: description
props.value: Provide privacy and security notices consistent with applicable CUI rules.

props.name: description
props.value: Use session lock with pattern-hiding displays to prevent access and viewing of data after a period of inactivity.

props.name: description
props.value: Terminate (automatically) a user session after a defined condition.

props.name: description
props.value: Monitor and control remote access sessions.

props.name: description
props.value: Employ cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions.

props.name: description
props.value: Route remote access via managed access control points.

props.name: description
props.value: Authorize remote execution of privileged commands and remote access to security-relevant information.

props.name: description
props.value: Authorize wireless access prior to allowing such connections.

props.name: description
props.value: Protect wireless access using authentication and encryption.

props.name: description
props.value: Encrypt CUI on mobile devices and mobile computing platforms.

props.name: description
props.value: Limit use of portable storage devices on external systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Ensure that managers, systems administrators, and users of organizational systems are made aware of the security risks associated with their activities and of the applicable policies, standards, and procedures related to the security of those systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Ensure that personnel are trained to carry out their assigned information security-related duties and responsibilities.

props.name: description
props.value: Provide security awareness training on recognizing and reporting potential indicators of insider threat.

props.name: description
props.value: Create and retain system audit logs and records to the extent needed to enable the monitoring, analysis, investigation, and reporting of unlawful or unauthorized system activity.

props.name: description
props.value: Ensure that the actions of individual system users can be uniquely traced to those users, so they can be held accountable for their actions.

props.name: description
props.value: Alert in the event of an audit logging process failure.

props.name: description
props.value: Correlate audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes for investigation and response to indications of unlawful, unauthorized, suspicious, or unusual activity.

props.name: description
props.value: Provide audit record reduction and report generation to support on-demand analysis and reporting.

props.name: description
props.value: Provide a system capability that compares and synchronizes internal system clocks with an authoritative source to generate time stamps for audit records.

props.name: description
props.value: Protect audit information and audit logging tools from unauthorized access, modification, and deletion.

props.name: description
props.value: Limit management of audit logging functionality to a subset of privileged users.

props.name: description
props.value: Establish and maintain baseline configurations and inventories of organizational systems (including hardware, software, firmware, and documentation) throughout the respective system development life cycles.

props.name: description
props.value: Establish and enforce security configuration settings for information technology products employed in organizational systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Track, review, approve or disapprove, and log changes to organizational systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Analyze the security impact of changes prior to implementation.

props.name: description
props.value: Define, document, approve, and enforce physical and logical access restrictions associated with changes to organizational systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Employ the principle of least functionality by configuring organizational systems to provide only essential capabilities.

props.name: description
props.value: Restrict, disable, or prevent the use of nonessential programs, functions, ports, protocols, and services.

props.name: description
props.value: Apply deny-by-exception (blacklisting) policy to prevent the use of unauthorized software or deny-all, permit-by-exception (whitelisting) policy to allow the execution of authorized software.

props.name: description
props.value: Identify information system users, processes acting on behalf of users, or devices.

props.name: description
props.value: Authenticate (or verify) the identities of those users, processes, or devices, as a prerequisite to allowing access to organizational information systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Use multifactor authentication for local and network access to privileged accounts and for network access to non-privileged accounts.

props.name: description
props.value: Employ replay-resistant authentication mechanisms for network access to privileged and non-privileged accounts.

props.name: description
props.value: Prevent reuse of identifiers for a defined period.

props.name: description
props.value: Disable identifiers after a defined period of inactivity.

props.name: description
props.value: Enforce a minimum password complexity and change of characters when new passwords are created.

props.name: description
props.value: Prohibit password reuse for a specified number of generations.

props.name: description
props.value: Allow temporary password use for system logons with an immediate change to a permanent password.

props.name: description
props.value: Store and transmit only cryptographically-protected passwords.

props.name: description
props.value: Establish an operational incident-handling capability for organizational systems that includes preparation, detection, analysis, containment, recovery, and user response activities.

props.name: description
props.value: Track, document, and report incidents to designated officials and/or authorities both internal and external to the organization.

props.name: description
props.value: Test the organizational incident response capability.

props.name: description
props.value: Provide controls on the tools, techniques, mechanisms, and personnel used to conduct system maintenance.

props.name: description
props.value: Ensure equipment removed for off-site maintenance is sanitized of any CUI.

props.name: description
props.value: Check media containing diagnostic and test programs for malicious code before the media are used in organizational systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Require multifactor authentication to establish nonlocal maintenance sessions via external network connections and terminate such connections when nonlocal maintenance is complete.

props.name: description
props.value: Supervise the maintenance activities of maintenance personnel without required access authorization.

props.name: description
props.value: Sanitize or destroy information system media containing Federal Contract Information before disposal or release for reuse.

props.name: description
props.value: Protect (i.e., physically control and securely store) system media containing CUI, both paper and digital.

props.name: description
props.value: Limit access to CUI on system media to authorized users.

props.name: description
props.value: Mark media with necessary CUI markings and distribution limitations.

props.name: description
props.value: Control access to media containing CUI and maintain accountability for media during transport outside of controlled areas.

props.name: description
props.value: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of CUI stored on digital media during transport unless otherwise protected by alternative physical safeguards.

props.name: description
props.value: Control the use of removable media on system components.

props.name: description
props.value: Prohibit the use of portable storage devices when such devices have no identifiable owner.

props.name: description
props.value: Protect the confidentiality of backup CUI at storage locations.

props.name: description
props.value: Screen individuals prior to authorizing access to organizational systems containing CUI.

props.name: description
props.value: Ensure that organizational systems containing CUI are protected during and after personnel actions such as terminations and transfers.

props.name: description
props.value: Limit physical access to organizational information systems, equipment, and the respective operating environments to authorized individuals.

props.name: description
props.value: Escort visitors and monitor visitor activity.

props.name: description
props.value: Maintain audit logs of physical access.

props.name: description
props.value: Control and manage physical access devices.

props.name: description
props.value: Protect and monitor the physical facility and support infrastructure for organizational systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Enforce safeguarding measures for CUI at alternate work sites.

props.name: description
props.value: Periodically assess the risk to organizational operations (including mission, functions, image, or reputation), organizational assets, and individuals, resulting from the operation of organizational systems and the associated processing, storage, or transmission of CUI.

props.name: description
props.value: Scan for vulnerabilities in organizational systems and applications periodically and when new vulnerabilities affecting those systems and applications are identified.

props.name: description
props.value: Remediate vulnerabilities in accordance with risk assessments.

props.name: description
props.value: Periodically assess the security controls in organizational systems to determine if the controls are effective in their application.

props.name: description
props.value: Develop and implement plans of action designed to correct deficiencies and reduce or eliminate vulnerabilities in organizational systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Monitor security controls on an ongoing basis to ensure the continued effectiveness of the controls.

props.name: description
props.value: Develop, document, and periodically update system security plans that describe system boundaries, system environments of operation, how security requirements are implemented, and the relationships with or connections to other systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Monitor, control, and protect organizational communications (i.e., information transmitted or received by organizational information systems) at the external boundaries and key internal boundaries of the information systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Implement subnetworks for publicly accessible system components that are physically or logically separated from internal networks.

props.name: description
props.value: Employ architectural designs, software development techniques, and systems engineering principles that promote effective information security within organizational systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Separate user functionality from system management functionality.

props.name: description
props.value: Prevent unauthorized and unintended information transfer via shared system resources.

props.name: description
props.value: Deny network communications traffic by default and allow network communications traffic by exception (i.e., deny all, permit by exception).

props.name: description
props.value: Prevent remote devices from simultaneously establishing non-remote connections with organizational systems and communicating via some other connection to resources in external networks (i.e., split tunneling).

props.name: description
props.value: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to prevent unauthorized disclosure of CUI during transmission unless otherwise protected by alternative physical safeguards.

props.name: description
props.value: Terminate network connections associated with communications sessions at the end of the sessions or after a defined period of inactivity.

props.name: description
props.value: Establish and manage cryptographic keys for cryptography employed in organizational systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Employ FIPS-validated cryptography when used to protect the confidentiality of CUI.

props.name: description
props.value: Prohibit remote activation of collaborative computing devices and provide indication of devices in use to users present at the device.

props.name: description
props.value: Control and monitor the use of mobile code.

props.name: description
props.value: Control and monitor the use of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies.

props.name: description
props.value: Protect the authenticity of communications sessions.

props.name: description
props.value: Protect the confidentiality of CUI at rest.

props.name: description
props.value: Identify, report, and correct information and information system flaws in a timely manner.

props.name: description
props.value: Provide protection from malicious code at appropriate locations within organizational information systems.

props.name: description
props.value: Update malicious code protection mechanisms when new releases are available.

props.name: description
props.value: Perform periodic scans of the information system and real-time scans of files from external sources as files are downloaded, opened, or executed.

props.name: description
props.value: Monitor system security alerts and advisories and take action in response.

props.name: description
props.value: Monitor organizational systems, including inbound and outbound communications traffic, to detect attacks and indicators of potential attacks.

props.name: description
props.value: Identify unauthorized use of organizational systems.
